body:
Maybe this is a better place: https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/core/platform/macros.h#L42

Perhaps `TF_DLLEXPORT` is a more standard name:
```
#if defined(PLATFORM_WINDOWS)
# ifdef TF_COMPILE_LIBRARY
#  define TF_DLLEXPORT __declspec(dllimport)
# else
#  define TF_DLLEXPORT __declspec(dllexport)
# endif   // TF_COMPILE_LIBRARY
#else
# define TF_DLLEXPORT __attribute__((visibility(default))
#endif  // PLATFORM_WINDOWS
```

In time, we'll export the symbols (whitelist) rather than blacklist.

CC: @skye
